definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: A application of bioconversion of cellulose in production of feed and fertilizer was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 综述了纤维素生物转化在农业饲料和肥料中的应用。

sentences.english: Let poisonous weeds sprout, then uproot them and plough them under for manure.
sentences.chinese: 毒草让它出来，然后锄掉，锄倒可以作肥料。

sentences.english: Manure from genetically modified animals is not certifiable.
sentences.chinese: 转基因动物来源肥料不可被认证。

sentences.english: Crookes came up a solution that to create a chemical fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 科鲁克斯提出的解决办法是创造一种化学肥料。

sentences.english: The total cost of the seed lings seedlings and fertilizer is $200. dollars.
sentences.chinese: 包括幼苗和肥料在内所有的花费大约200美元。

sentences.english: Guano means droppings from seabirds used as a sort of fertilizer .
sentences.chinese: 鸟粪层就是海鸟的粪便，可以用作肥料。

sentences.english: The solution Crookes proposed was to create artificial fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 科鲁克斯提出的解决办法是创造一种化学肥料。

sentences.english: It can also seep in from some pesticides and fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 同样它们也可以通过杀虫剂和肥料渗透进食物。

sentences.english: Throw the potato peelings on the compost heap.
sentences.chinese: 把土豆皮扔到肥料堆上。

sentences.english: Joni: Oh, this bag of fertilizer is so heavy.
Urea isn't commonly found in agricultural fertilizers, but it is present in many garden products.
sentences.chinese: 尿素很少用于农业肥料，但是常常用作花肥。

sentences.english: (KNO3) used especially as a fertilizer and explosive.
Get some more fertilizer for this flower.
sentences.chinese: 给这棵花再多施些肥料。

sentences.english: The paper gives a detailed introduction to the structure and working principle of YN type speediness soil and fertilizer nutrient measuring apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了YN型土壤肥料养分测定仪的结构及工作原理。

sentences.english: This web site also provides information about composting knowledge, and composter's forum, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这里还提供了堆制肥料的相关知识和堆肥论坛。

definition: fertilizer for potted flowers/fertilizer used to promote flowering in crop plants
to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method
